attributes.action: We, the people, demand our elected government fulfils our democratic vote.
attributes.additional_details: We hereby give notice that this demands that the results of the referendum on EU membership be honoured in full. We point out that in the run up to the vote it was agreed that no partial exits were possible by both sides. We also point out that nowhere was any option given to vote to "negotiate our leaving the EU." It is for these reasons we demand exiting the EU to trade under WTO rules. No other option is acceptable.
attributes.background: To respect Magna Carta as the foundation of democracy and respect majority rules. Anyone who seeks to undermine this committing treason against the state of Great Britain.
